headline.main: OUTLINES PALESTINE ROLE; Head of War Supply Board Hits at 'Powers of Evil'

lead_paragraph: JERUSALEM, March 2 -- Expressing the hope that Palestine might be enabled to play a larger part than at present in the defeat of the "powers of evil," Douglas Gordon Harris, high administration official, who has just been appointed chairman of the country's new War Supply Board, tonight outlined the functions of that body.
abstract: D G Harris, new Palestine War Supply Bd chmn, outlines bd's functions
